reviews.text: I had a wonderful experience! I needed it after getting sick from mold at a near by hotel. The ILUNION staff welcomed me with open arms. The room was perfect. Clean, had everything we needed, and peaceful. The location of this hotel canâ€™t be beat! And they even arranged our early morning taxi to the airport! Love this place! Love the staff! Loved our room!!!!

Wasn't sure what to expect as family had booked the rooms for us. Hotel is well located, modern, rooms are very clean (I'm very picky about this!) and great water pressure in the shower!!!!! Front desk and breakfast staff are very professional, accommodating, and very helpful.  Breakfast was great! Alot of options to choose from and they even had lactose free milk!!!! I don't get that luxury when travelling and was pleasantly surprised and relieved to see that as an option!

This is a great location for visiting Sagrada Familia as it is just a 12 min walk downhill from here. Good neighborhood, with lots of restaurants, grocery stores and anything else you may need. About a brisk 50 min walk to the beach. The staff is helpful and knowledgeable, the hotel clean, quiet and the breakfast had a lot of different options.

We had a great stay here! All the staff were very kind but Alberto was friendly, attentive and welcoming each morning which was very appreciative during our stay here ! We recommend anyone to stay here !

Amazing staff and service. Everyone at the hotel was always ready to help with anything from extra towels, water, or recommendations on the best restaurants. We always came back to a clean and tidy room with the tea and coffee reserves refreshed and the mini fridge stacked with water.
Breakfast service was exceptional, very kind and attentive workers.

The location was amazing. Close to the metro and around 10 minutes from la Sagrada familia. A 20 minute metro ride to the beach or other popular tourist areas. Far enough away from Sagrada familia that the area is pretty quiet.

Could not recommend this hotel more.
